#summary This wiki describe the COG module on the Relational Schema

= Domain =

The *COG* module is based on the [http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/COG/ COG] data source. The figure shows the *COG* module relational schema. 

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/COG.png

This module is based on the NCBI COG and KOG databases. Also, the [http://eggnog.embl.de eggNOG] database can be inserted by this module.
